Posts.Content: Hi Carol, Thanks so much for the advice, especially Evonail, I will get some as I don't want to loose my currently long and strong nails as well as my hair! So pleased you have now finished the plan. Best Wishes Lizzie
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated

Posts.Content: Hi, I have just been given my treatment plan for breast cancer. Herceptin+Docetaxel+ Carboplatin, it starts next week. Is anyone else on this plan? I am terrified! The side effects sound awful. Any support welcomed   Lizzie.
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated

Posts.Content: Thank you Sue, So appreciated, a big hug to you too, for the reassurance and support Lizzie xx
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated

Posts.Content: Thanks  Wendy, I am glad it is not all 'bad news', I am a 'control freak' so this will be a difficult journey! Thanks for your good wishes and glad it is OK for you. Lizzie xx
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated

Posts.Content: Thanks Jo, I am glad I am not alone in being terrified! Yes, have been told I will loose my hair so need to find a wig fast!! You take care too and good luck to you. I hope you continue to be able to do all those things. Lizzie
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated

Posts.Content: Thanks Katie, I got off lightly last time, they removed the very small cancer in my right breast & put me on Tamoxifen + annual mammograms. That's how they picked this one up in the other breast four years later! I am so lucky they did. I just need to get started, I hate needles!! Best Wishes to you too, Lizzie.
Posts.Title: Any comments/help appreciated
